          <title>
            <string language="en">Burning of copper</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Brennen des Kupfers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Brûlure du cuivre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Queimadura do cobre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Bruciandosi del rame</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κάψιμο του χαλκού</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El quemarse del cobre</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that copper burns when chemically reacted with oxygen and forms copper oxide in powder form.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">metals</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">oxidation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">compounds</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">copper</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">copper oxide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">elements</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">metal oxides</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">oxygen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">substances</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß Kupfer brennt, wenn es
chemisch mit Sauerstoff und Kupferoxid der Formulare in der Puderform 
reagiert wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que le cuivre brûle une
fois chimiquement réagi avec l'oxygène et l'oxyde de cuivre de 
formes sous la forme de poudre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que o cobre se queima 
quando reagido quimicamente com o oxigênio e o óxido de cobre dos 
formulários no formulário do pó.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che il rame si brucia 
una volta chimicamente reagito con ossigeno e l'ossido di rame delle 
forme nella forma della polvere.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι ο χαλκός καίει όταν 
αντιδριέται χημικά με το οξυγόνο και διαμορφώνει το οξείδιο 
χαλκού με μορφή σκονών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que el cobre se quema 
cuando químicamente está reaccionado con oxígeno y el óxido de 
cobre de las formas en forma del polvo.</string>
          </description>
